Title: Ratchet & Clank
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: T.J. Fixman, Kevin Munroe, Gerry Swallow, Brian Allgeier (video games), Brian Hastings (video games), Alex Hastings (video games)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, John Goodman, Bella Thorne, Rosario Dawson
Plot: Ratchet and Clank tells the story of two unlikely heroes as they struggle to stop a vile alien named Chairman Drek from destroying every planet in the Solana Galaxy. When the two stumble upon a dangerous weapon capable of destroying entire planets, they must join forces with a team of colorful heroes called The Galactic Rangers in order to save the galaxy. Along the way they'll learn about heroism, friendship, and the importance of discovering one's own identity.
